name: Calendar 2014
description:
2014: THE YEAR OF THE BRUSH

“To understand the world in all its colour, you sometimes have to BECOME THE BRUSH that it is being painted with.” - Bhoomie Musing

Quick facts:
  • Printed on FSC certified paper
  • 12 different gift wrap designs printed on the back of each month to allow for re-use.
  • Every month has a theme + a green tip + a centering thought + a book suggestion + a sing-along-soul-song + lots of space for notes and doodles
  • Limited Edition
  • Available in English and German

These monthly lumps of sweetness were created to support and inspire you in 2014. What better way to BECOME THE BRUSH, than to look through the eyes of the inner child? Playfulness, newfound innocence and unrestrained belief in possibility are bound to lead us to rediscover WONDER. The gift of compassion will flow through you when you let the whole wide colourful world into your heart.

To enhance your cuddles of appreciation with Mama Earth, we’ve printed the back of every calendar month with a pattern suitable for wrapping gifts in. This gives your calendar a second life and will make the act of giving even more fun. Your calendar is printed on paper approved by the Forest Stewardship Council (FSC).

Have a Wonder-Infused 2014!

Lie-Lie & The Bhoomies

name: Kalender 2014
description:
Über den Kalender 

2014, das Jahr des Pinsels

“Um die Welt in all ihren Farben zu verstehen, müssen wir manchmal zum Pinsel werden, mit dem sie gemalt wird.” - Bhoomie Sprichwort

Kurze Fakten:
  • Auf FSC-zertifiziertem Papier gedruckt
  • Wiederverwendbar durch rückseitige Gestaltung mit 12 individuellen Geschenkpapier-Designs
  • Jeder Monat hat ein Thema + einen grünen Tipp + einen zentralen Gedanken + einen Buchvorschlag + einen Mitsingsong + viel Platz für Notizen und Kritzeleien
  • Limitierte Auflage
  • Erhältlich auf englisch und deutsch

Diese monatlichen Wonneproppen wurden für Freude und Inspiration im Jahr 2014 geschaffen. Was wäre besser, als "zum Pinsel zu werden", um die Welt mit den Augen eines Kindes zu sehen? Verspieltheit, neu gefundene Unschuld und uneingeschränkter Glaube an eine Welt voller Möglichkeiten lassen uns die Wunder des Alltags neu entdecken.

Um dem Kalender mehr als nur ein Leben zu geben, ist die Rückseite jedes Kalenderblatts mit einem eigenen Design versehen, damit es zum Beispiel als Geschenkpapier verwendet werden kann. Damit versuchen wir, dem umweltfreundlichen Anspruch der Bhoomies gerecht zu werden und hoffen, dass Geschenke verteilen damit noch mehr Freude bereitet. Der Kalender ist auf FSC-zertifiziertem Papier gedruckt.

Auf ein 2014 voller Wunder!

Lie-Lie & die Bhoomies

Über die Bhoomies

Die Bhoomies sind kleine Erdgeister, die in völligem Einklang mit der Natur leben. Sie wachsen jeden Tag ein bisschen in ihrem Inneren und nehmen das Leben wie es ist: wunderschön, außergewöhnlich, leicht und voller Freude. Sie sind Botschafter des Glücks und unterstützen alle Erdenbewohner darin, ein Leben voller Möglichkeiten zu leben.

name: Samson
description:
His strength lies in his hair...so does his poetry! Meet Samson, the lion who is both a flower and a rock.

Click here to sign up for:

Samson - Greeting Card

Samson on the front of thick 340 gsm FSC approved paper with a light satin coating on the outside. The inside is all yours for your poetic words. Comes packaged in a bio-degradable sleeve and includes a natural brown envelope made from recycled paper. (Pssst. You can also take 4 cards for 10€!)

Samson - Art Print

This is a high quality  18 x 24 cm (on A4) print complete with string and clips to create the look in the picture. Printed using archival inks and paper, with a beautiful matte finish. The package will include the Signed Print + Samson's story + String and Clips + Strength and Sensitivity.

Samson - Canvas Print

Your package will include a 40 x 30 x 4 cm Canvas printed with Archival Quality Ink - Ready for hanging. It comes with Samson's story + A Certificate of Authenticity + Laughter and Possibility + A little extra surprise for you!

Click on the drop down box to make your selection.

name: End of the World Box
description:
Click here to sign up for:

End of the World Box

Your package will include a beautiful hand finished  15 x 15 x 9 cm box designed around the theme of the Letting Go Bhoomie and the Wisdom of Richard Bach that said: "What the caterpillar calls the END OF THE WORLD, the master calls a BUTTERFLY".

For the caterpillar to leave the old behind to invite in the new requires some serious LETTING GO. Maybe this is what the cocoon is for. A comfy place for the caterpillar to let go at his own pace.

The box is intended for gratitude notes, tea, jewellery or whatever you need to give yourself the space and comfort you need to create your own "cocoon".

It makes for a beautiful gift for someone that needs little moments of comfort every so often. Handcrafted just for you. Leave about 3 weeks to allow me to create something beautiful for you.

Click on the drop down box to make your selection.

name: Personalised Bhoomies
description:
Personalised Bhoomie

Surprise someone special in your life and have a 20 x 20cm Bhoomie designed around their eccentricities.

It will still look like a Bhoomie - but I can adjust it to whatever this person does or say regularly. What makes them special, unique, funny, cute? Something that they say regularly? Very curly hair? You give me something to work with and I will ponder until I find the perfect Bhoomie Solution.

As an example: A friend of mine loves cookies and milk and he walks around singing things like "c is for cookie and cookie is for me". And that is how the Milk and Cookies Bhoomie came about.

I will set up a Bhoomie and play around with the hair, the background, the body, the expression and text to make it fit to whoever this gift is for.

After you placed the order, I will e-mail you a Questionnaire and set-up a Skype-meeting with you so that we can communicate the possibilities.

(Remember this is not a portrait, it is a little bit of the receivers essence mixed into a Bhoomie Illustration.)

You will receive an individualised design that is hand-painted onto a 20 x 20 x 4 cm canvas. The sides will be painted as well, so your painting will be ready to hang. It will be beautifully packaged, including a certificate of authenticity and its story. Looking forward to tailoring your Bhoomie to you!

 Click on the drop down box to place your order.
